name: files_remote_list
description: Retrieve information about a remote file added to Slack

channel.description: Filter files appearing in a specific channel, indicated by its ID.

ts_from.description: Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive).

ts_to.description: Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive).

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return.

cursor.description: Paginate through collections of data by setting the `cursor` parameter to a `next_cursor` attribute returned by a previous request's `response_metadata`. Default value fetches the first "page" of the collection. See [pagination](/docs/pagination) for more detail.

$block: This method either only returns a brief _OK_ response or a verbose schema is not available for this method.
This method either only returns a brief _not OK_ response or a verbose schema is not available for this method.
